Accordion

Accordion

Hide and reveal less important content on the page.

    On this page
  • Visual design
  • Guidelines for use
  • Layouts

Visual design

Open all
button toggle all accordions
Accordion item 1
  • Accordions can contain lists.
  • Complete with links like other body copy.
Accordion item 2

Accordions can be used to hide less important text on the page. The user can choose to see it only if they are interested in it.

CSS styles

View design and assets in Adobe XD.

Guidelines for use

Purpose

Accordions are used when copy is necessarily detailed, lengthy and task completion is possible without seeing the supporting detail.

When to use this component

Coming soon.

Layouts

Page width

Accordion components should only be used in two-third width pages.

Full width layout

Desktop, Tablet & Mobile: One component in a row.
